website_summaries.verdict: Rock a retro pinup look in this super cute halter one piece, and channel your inner Betty Boop.
pros: This skirted suit is flattering for many different body types, and looks on trend without exposing a lot of skin, as well as being comfortable to wear
Comes in various color combos, including a patriotic red and white stripe with blue skirt
cons: The bra cups are not right for everyone, but they are removable

customer_reviews.title: Really nice swim suit
customer_reviews.text: Really nice swim suit. Slim fit, cute skirt, adorable print. I’m 5’8” 190 lbs and the xl fits perfect and keeps my thighs looking discrete.
customer_reviews.author: Mis7aken

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'2, 230, size 18 jeans I ordered a size 3x and it's perfect
customer_reviews.author: UnBELLieveable Events

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it! I usually don't write reviews .... But the reviews are what made me purchase it! I am 5'4, 185lbs, size 16 shorts/pants and I bought the one for US16 and it is a little loose in the tummy area but not enough to go to a size smaller. Truly a great fit and I am excited for summer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FIT!
customer_reviews.text: I was soooo nervous about this swimsuit because it arrived the day BEFORE I was set to leave for vacation so if it didn't fit right I was in trouble so I was going off of previous reviews..and it fit PERFECT and I made head rolls and jaws drop 😂😄. The BEST swimsuit I've EVER purchased. Will be buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic and flattering
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic suit. I couldn't be more happy. I have had 5 kids I'm nearly 50 and thought I would never be happy exposed on the beach again-until now. I love this suit, it hides all my ugly bits and flatters the rest. I could even have gone a size smaller but at the time I was worried about the fit. I am so so happy with this I won't be ashamed to be seen with my skinny friend.
customer_reviews.author: clare

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a XXL since that is what I usually wear and it fits wonderfully. I'm only 4'9" 210lbs and wear a 38DDD. I did have to take the cups out as I do with most things but I just love it.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie Wimmer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite suit ever.
customer_reviews.text: I have never felt so cute in a swim suit. Im 5'4" 250, size 18/20, 42B and ended up woth a 4x. I could have gone down to a 3x but I like that it isnt super snug (not sloppy either) I def think a size 22 maybe 24 could also fit the 4xl. The material is nice. Its shorties underneath so prob less likely for the dreaded thigh chafe. The bads are quite like stiff bowls, as mentioned in othwr reviews...but it kind of makes it look like I have a chest so no huge complaint.
customer_reviews.author: LadiM

customer_reviews.title: I love this bathing suit
customer_reviews.text: I love this bathing suit! I am tall And curvy and let me tell you this all black suit really makes me feel very sexy And compliments my figure. For me it's hard to find a bathing suit in a store. It always turns out to be short on me. The fabric smells a little bad, but I hope with a wash it will smell Better. It's a little big since I did get a larger size because I am 6'. I can't wait to wear it out to the beach! I feel confident.
customer_reviews.author: W.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy, excellent quality, can't tell the difference between this swim dress and ones they sell in department stores. I'm 5' 2"/157cm, 100 lbs, bra: 32A, bust: 29, waist: 25, hips 32. I ordered a size small, fits great.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Cute suit!
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'6", 145lbs, and a full 36DD. I ordered the Large, based on other reviews and it fits just fine. Shorts underneath could've a little tighter, but I can live with it. I have ALWAYS had a hard time finding a suit to fit my chest...and this was no exception. I had to take the padding out of the suits cups because they're made for a smaller cup size. If it was made for my actual size AND filled the entire cup I would def have given this suit a 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: jen y

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love
customer_reviews.text: I usually get my swimsuits from a name plus size store. But I couldn't really afford to cough up $90 on a swimsuit this year. I'm so glad I found this baby! So super flattering and the price is amazing! I can't wait to show it off at the pool. It's unbelievably comfortable and did I mention how flattering it is??
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: bariatric and plus size! 🤗💕
customer_reviews.text: Bariatrics patient... I've lost 99lbs in the last 9 months with the goal of loosing 34more. I ware body shapers every day. I wanted to find a suite that I could hide a body shapers under, but this one doesn't even need it!! Holds the girls up, hides the weird skin/fat between your breast and shoulders. I have loose skin in between my thighs that's not pretty. It's just perfect length to hide that too! As well as holding the tummy in enough to look as if I was wearing one of my shappers. LOVE!! With the design I am super confident that it's great for tall and short gals.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Marie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love the suit!!! I am 5 ft 7 inches tall and weigh between 150-155 pounds. I am in between a 36 D and 36 DD bra size wise and normally wear a size 10 in most U.S. clothes. I bought a large. This was comfortable, light weight, and fit great. I have another suit similar in design where the under short part was too tight (I have thick thighs) but these were not they were ever so slightly lose which was great; they won't ride up and make me uncomfortable while in the water or moving around :).
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy!!!  Perfect fit!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely happy with my order. Couldn't ask for a better fit. Great quality as well. For those who need an idea on what size is right for them. I always appreciate having someone list their size and height, since it helped me with choosing appropriately. I ordered a size Medium. I am 5'4" and about 137-140 lbs. I have a pretty averaged torso too. Hope you enjoy this swim suit as much as I do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love!!! I've been wanting a cute retro style swimsuit for awhile but haven't found one quite as flattering as this one! Since having my 2 babies, I've been looking for one to hide the new wonderful cellulite I got lol and this does the job! The cups have a little push up but not too much. Only thing is the shorts are a tiny bit too big around my thighs. Doesn't really matter though because the skirt covers it lol other than that it fits perfect!! I'm 5'3" measurements 36, 28, 36 and I'm 125. I got a medium :)
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Pennello

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Pictures aren't the best, had to stand on my toilet... lol. Anyways, I honestly don't write reviews but I really wanted to with this product to let every other woman out there know how great it is! Right after trying it on I immediately fell in love, I wanted to LIVE in this swimsuit... lol. The sizing is definitely true to fit. I weigh 208. I'm about a size 14 in pants and 36C in bra. I do agree with others that the pads in the bra part are a bit awkward, but I'll make it work for how absolutely cute, comfy, and flattering it is! Definitely a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not great.
customer_reviews.text: So I'm having a love hate relationship with this suit. It fits great in the top (after removing the cone boob pads), but it fits loose in the bottom when dry, but okay when wet and sticking to me. However gives me an atomic wedgie. I'm also disappointed in the fact that the all black was unavailable at the time of purchase, because damn near every sunscreen I've used has stained the white parts of my suit. It's worst where it ties around my neck and rubs my skin constantly. For reference I have a 40DD chest and I wear a size 15 pants.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Wowza!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Covers my thighs just right, like boy shorts. It's very flattering, I'd say slimming. The dress part doesn't float up, if it does though, it's a one piece, so no skin will be showing. I love the plunge of the neck! Makes my curves! UPDATE I've worn this several times. From reading other reviews, I was really scared to wash it, afraid the colors would bleed. They did not. I washed in cold/cold, handwash cycle. Hang to dry. It's still gorgeous. I do recommend sticking to the CocoShip suits, I've ordered similar suits to this and the cut and sizes are all wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Maidinbliss

customer_reviews.title: Hello Sailor!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a suit to replace my pin up cherry bomb halter and this one is adorable. I'm quite busty (34G) and the bust area fit perfectly. It's very flattering for us curvy girls. Go for it!!
customer_reviews.author: Punkin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bathing suit.
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome bathing suit. I always dread buying a suit so when this came in I was nervous to try it on. Nothing ever looks or feels right on me. I am 5'8 212pds. What a surprise. It looks and feels awesome. Hides just the right spots but feels and looks awesome on me. I cant wait to wear it in Aruba in 3 weeks. I ordered a size up and it fits perfectly. Oh by the way, I ordered a XXXL if that helps. (5'8, 212 pds) Dont shy away from the size. I usually wear XXL IN BATHING SUITS
customer_reviews.author: kimberly s schildwachter

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this swimsuit! I bought the XXXL based on the size guides. I'm 5'8, 215 lbs I wear a 36 C Bra, size 16 jeans, and L or XL shirts depending on fit. Honestly I could have gone down a size, and had no trouble wearing it. The fabric is really good quality and VERY forgiving/stretchy. I wear this suit with confidence and plan to buy another one for next summer. Great value too! Highly recommend :-)
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: Ibiza Blue is the  color for us busty blondes
customer_reviews.text: I bought size XL and it fits perfect ! 50 yrs old, 5'4 tall 170lbs 38D-40D bust my clothing size is usually L or size 10/12 I have not gotten it wet yet but the pads are bunching up just trying it on and off it seems that the can be smoothed out. it does need to be tied tight around the neck to hold up the girls, and after a dip in the pool i think it will need to be readjusted. ALSO NOTE- if you have to go to the bathroom you will have to pull down the whole suit, the bottoms are attached- not separates.
customer_reviews.author: ChristineFlorida

customer_reviews.title: awesome suit
customer_reviews.text: Ok ladies just let me tell you if you are too modest for skimpy suits or if your like me and a little too old for young girl suits. This suit is for you. It is a classic. And hides those ugly thighs and give you modesty with high fashion. Also it gives you lift( you know where) with support. I also like that the tummy is made to help you be comfortable and has a nice slimming effect. I am 156lbs and short. This suit made me feel like the fashion Diva I was at 40. I love this suit and the children enjoyed grandma playing with them in the water...The sizes are perfect
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Stroupe

customer_reviews.title: The underneath is boyshots but it's all one piece so it's extra comfortable. Never in my life have I been able ...
customer_reviews.text: I actually wish I could give MORE stars. This suite is so so cute! Very flattering even for a heavier girl. I felt all the right parts are covered but it's also very cute for a one piece. The underneath is boyshots but it's all one piece so it's extra comfortable. Never in my life have I been able to find a suite in a store nearly as amazing and affordable! Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alisa Knuttel

customer_reviews.title: Great suit! Can't wait for the beach
customer_reviews.text: Great suit; I love it! Based on other reviews, I ordered an XL. I'm 5'8", and 190 lbs @ 1 month postpartum. It fits now and looks like it will still fit after I lose more baby weight. I've already recommended it to my friends and a few want one of their own. You should get one for yourself. It's my favorite suit I've ever owned!
customer_reviews.author: G. Watling

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The fit was great. I'm 5'8, 260lbs, size 22/24 dress. I wish it was a little looser in the tummy. If that's a problem area it may not sit/flatter you they way you want. Watch out for where it sits around your chest/where bra band is. I have to adjust it up from time to time to keep the flab under the arm pit under control and hidden. Ha! Overall it's a good suit for a nice price. I live the retro style so much!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Babcock

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING, flattering, plus size
customer_reviews.text: This swimsuit is made out of amazing quality material. It’s stretchy and comfortable, and so flattering. Based on my weight, 220lbs and height of 5’4”, 40DDD bust, I ordered the 4x. I cut the pads out of the top like everyone else suggested. Extremely comfortable with a bit of extra room, and the boob area was surprisingly SO SPACIOUS, I could have bigger boobs and still fit this!!!! It’s hard for me to find tops that hold these in without cutting circulation off on my neck. This swimsuit is unbelievable and my husband loves it. He wants me to order more in different colors!
customer_reviews.author: Christian A Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Flattering Swimsuit, but Sizing is Off!
customer_reviews.text: This swimsuit is super cute and covers everything it needs to. The butt area is a little loose, but everything else fits comfortably and there's no butt sticking out or showing. The only bad thing about the swimsuit is that the size chart is unreliable and overall, the sizing runs really small! I am 5' 6", weigh around 118 lb, and have a small bust of 36AAA. I thought the Small would fit me, but I ended up needing a Large, which is about 2 sizes larger than I normally wear. The Small fit like a size 0. The Medium fit like a size 2. The Large fit like a size 4 or 6.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: If I could give more then 5 stars I would!
customer_reviews.text: Best swimsuit I've ever bought in my life ! Most flattering swimsuit ever! The straps are thick enough to help hide that arm fat every girl hates lol. Short enough skirt, shorts built in. Side pockets in bra area to remove pads. The "girls" are very secure and look great too! Loved it so much I bought another print! I'm 5ft5in 130 pounds I normally wear a 6/8 in Jean's I bought the medium and it's a perfect fit!
customer_reviews.author: Brebritt

customer_reviews.title: Sexy Swimsuit :-)
customer_reviews.text: I love this one piece swimsuit! I feel sexy again! It hides my imperfections and enhances my curves. I am 5'5 and weigh 190 lbs. I am a 40C. I first bought a 3XL and it was kind of tight on top it didnt cover my boobs. So I sent it back and bought a size 4XL and it fits perfectly. The shorts are a tiny bit big but that's alright I will take it in..no problem. I will buy another one (red flowers on top/black) soon. In the past, I always had a problem finding the right bathing suit but I'm very happy with this swimsuit. Fast delivery and well made swimsuit. 🌷💜😊
customer_reviews.author: NY Girl

customer_reviews.title: It’s semi flattering.
customer_reviews.text: So I didn’t hold in my stomach for these pics, so you could see what honestly shows. I have “saddle bags” or wide thighs. I was hoping this would hide them but it doesn’t. Mind you I’m only 5’3, meaning the dress is short if you are curvy. I have wide hips and a curvy booty, which shows nicely in the dress. Just keep in mind saddle bags & mama belly’s will not fully be hidden. I had my baby 8 months ago and was hoping to hide it the belly. This dress does flatter from the front, it semi flatters from the back, and it doesn’t hide much from the side.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Simaku

customer_reviews.title: I love the entire swimsuit especially the skirt part
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this swimsuit!! I’ve never ordered clothing from amazon and I took a chance to order a swimsuit since I couldn’t find a reasonably priced one in the stores. I’m plus size and I’m so tired of paying $100 to $150 at LaneBryant or Ashley Stuart for a swimsuit. The size chart is dead on and it fits so comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: christal

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fit with adorable style!! Very flattering!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing swimsuit!!! It is flattering and provides coverage at all the right places. It fit true to size for me and I liked it so much upon receiving that I am purchasing another in a different color. I usually hate bathing suits they dig or they don’t look right or they cover your “hot spots” but then add ten years because they look too old. This is an adorable 50’s pinup type suit and is very comfortable because under the skirt is shorts. The best thing is my husband said “you look hot!” So yes you need this suit ladies.
customer_reviews.author: ddstampsalot

customer_reviews.title: Awful!
customer_reviews.text: This bathing suit is a waste of money. The cups come bent and twisted so much that removing them through the provided hole is the only way to get it on. There isn’t enough fabric in the cups and it offers no support whatsoever. Not only is the halter style tie annoying flimsy, the elastic around the back slides down every time you move. If you have a very small chest and plan on not doing anything in the bath in suit other than stand still it might be ok but this was a huge waste of money and I wish I didn’t buy it
customer_reviews.author: Sprockettfuel

customer_reviews.title: My wife is in love
customer_reviews.text: My wife is a thicker gal and she has never looked better in a swimsuit! She is a vintage gal so she went with the lemon drop on black. MANY compliments. She adored the shorts underneath but a downside was having to use the restroom. The shorts are attached. She still loved it. Cons: the printing isn’t perfect but unless you are right up on it, you don’t notice. The shorts are attached (one piece) Print is a bit grainy
customer_reviews.author: Blackwolf

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love it.
customer_reviews.text: I recently had a baby and I'm 5'1 and 175lbs with a size C chest. I bought a size XL-12. It does not suck you in at all, which I thought I wanted, but I actually liked the super stretchy and soft material this is made from because it was so comfy. When dry it fit perfect, I couldnt even feel it even around my thighs. But when it got wet, it started to sag and the leg holes and bottom part sagged so bad it was just like... hanging off me like silly putty. So just watch out for that :) maybe I should have got a smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Very cute but not the best fit for petite women
customer_reviews.text: This bathing suit is very pretty but there are a few things I don't like and it's partially because I'm a petite woman. The style is beautiful and flattering. It shows the good stuff and hides most of the bad. I don't like the removable cups that shift around if you have to adjust the suit at all once it's on. I might have to sew in the cups and sew the halter straps criss-cross. The elastic that keeps the back up is tight feeling. Some of this is a result of the suit cut for a taller (average height) person but I think the design needs a few upgrades.
customer_reviews.author: Ally J

customer_reviews.title: Flattering and functional
customer_reviews.text: After having my baby I have struggled for the last two years to find a suit I felt comfortable in. I would find it hard to relax and enjoy family time in the water because I felt so self conscious of what I looked like. This suit has given me that confidence. It’s slimming, cute pinup style, gives the girls a lift and is functional. It has shorts built in underneath and they provide good coverage downstairs too. I’m able to keep up with my toddler and not worry about falling out of my suit. 5 stars all around.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee Walters

customer_reviews.title: Cute but runs a little big
customer_reviews.text: I am a 16 and I ordered the 3X, and it's a bit too big. I kept it, but may order another color in a next size down. It's very comfortable in the size I ordered - it feels almost like skinny dipping. But because it's so roomy, I did not get any smoothing or support. Even so, it is flattering! The halter meant I could at least make sure the bust fit was good enough. And unlike a different suit I ordered, the shorts and torso is the same material as the skirt - this means when you swim and the skirt floats up, it doesn't look weird.
customer_reviews.author: LC9919Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Let me be your Captain!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! So sexy! This bathing suit do wonders to your figure. It is lovely. Provide full support for my big two ladies(I am 40DDD). Just tie it properly and they will stay in place. If you have a hourglass shape this is perfect for you. The fabric is strong but it flows nicely. And the navy color combination with white is perfect. Just bring the boat and I will be your captain!! I am 5'4, weigh 226 and wear 18-20 shirts...fyi.
customer_reviews.author: PR_Sea_ Breeze

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, 'safe' and IN STYLE!
customer_reviews.text: SO happy with this bathing suit! My first fear was size; I read almost all the reviews and since I am a size 18 with an apple belly, I ordered the XXXL. It fit perfectly and not too tight. I love this swimming suit; I find at my size (and age), its so hard to find a cute suit without it seeming too young. This one has the skort look; like shorts underneath the skirt so that embarrassing moments can't happen. I feel comfortable and "safe" and especially, IN STYLE wearing this bathing suit.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Sykes

customer_reviews.title: Peek-a-boo leg openings!  No way to keep from showing the world what is underneath unless you wear bikini bottoms or something.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the initial look of the swimsuit. Like others, definitely follow suit and buy up a few sizes! Now for the downfalls: leg openings!!! There is NO built in panty and NO elastic at the leg opening. Unless you really want to be washing out sand from the ocean or expose everyone at the pool, you may want to think twice about this suit! Also, the bra cup pad is a one size fits a 14yo. Not all girls are built the same!
customer_reviews.author: Sunnyshine64

customer_reviews.title: It’s cute
customer_reviews.text: I like it more than all of my other swimsuits. It has enough support and no side-cleavage. My one problem with it is the flare on the skirt part starts too low. It hugs my mommy tummy before it starts to flare out. I tucked the smallest amount of fabric under right under the bust area and it looked perfect. So, that’s kind of frustrating that it still makes me look like I’m pregnant. To be honest, I will probably just sew a seam right there to make it look better because I do like it a lot and it would be easy to fix.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Never felt more confident in a swimsuit
customer_reviews.text: My first purchase was the XXXL of the black and white striped suit, but when I put it on, it was very large. I ended up ordering a XL which fit perfectly. I'm 215 lbs, 5'4. Also, the navy blue with red strips is MUCH CUTER imo. Black is nice too, but I feel it looks like as if I have something to hide. The red white and blue looks very 1950s pin-up. This suit is flattering in all the right places and will look good on any body type. Love this suit!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Clark

customer_reviews.title: Every self conscious curvy girl needs this bathing suit
customer_reviews.text: What's one more raving review in a sea of thousands? Like everyone else who purchased this item, I am so pleased. I am 5'5" and 185 lbs, which is mostly in my abdominal area and thighs. This suit is SEXY, flattering, and covers everything I don't want others to see. Every self conscious curvy girl needs this bathing suit. I bought an xl and could have used a large, but every body is different.
customer_reviews.author: LoganNats

customer_reviews.title: Love love LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: This swimsuit is my new favorite! I'm pretty busty and have a smaller waist it's super flattering. Extremely well made all except the freakishly small pads in the top part - which thankfully are easily removed via a little slit on the inside. Well beyond my expectations can't wait for the beach vacation to wear this! Thank you for such a beautiful and flattering suit that looks amamazing on so many types of bodies! :)
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy P.

customer_reviews.title: Good for pear-shaped bodies!
customer_reviews.text: This suit is very cute, definitely met my expectations, especially for the price! I am 5'4'', 145 lbs, and a very bottom- heavy pear shape. I ordered a size Large, and it fits perfect. The only reason I didn't give 5 stars, is I wish the boy shorts underneath were just a tad longer, since my big booty hangs out a bit. The skirt mostly covers it though, so I am happy with the suit. If it holds up through the summer, I would definitely buy one in another color!
customer_reviews.author: Michael  Santolini

customer_reviews.title: Love this one peice
customer_reviews.text: This product is beautifully made and conceals unwanted lump very well! I am 5"6' 200lbs 40c bra I wear a 14 pants and clothes top I bought an XXL and it fit perfect! I carry a lot of weight in my belly and his bathing suit does an amazing job of not showing any of it !! I definitely recommend this came fast and it very fancy
customer_reviews.author: km16ft

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy, read reviews for sizing suggestions
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. First time I've purchased clothes from Amazon and I was especially worried about a swimsuit. But the other reviews convinced me, and it definitely worked out well. I'm 6 ft and usually a size 16-18. I got a 4x and it's fits and is a bit roomy. I like it, and if you want a tighter fit the 3x would work. I got several compliments on it and finally felt comfortable walking around in a swimsuit with a cover up all day. Finally something make my chest look nice without hanging out, and the skirt is really flirty and cute. I will buy this in more colors and look for other styles from the brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Runs very small, but great suit!
customer_reviews.text: These run very small so size up, the size chart was confusing to me unless I clicked on the wrong thing. I am 5'3 195 typically wear an XL or 1x (14/16) and purchased this in an XXXL and it fits like an XL would've. But, by reading the reviews and the size chart I knew this head of time, so no disappointment. I love the style, nice quality material, very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: What’s with the cups?
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute swimsuit and the fit overall was true to size. But, the cups in the top do not provide full coverage. The cups are like half size? They make your breasts appear very uneven and give no support. This may work for a B cup or smaller. But, if you’re a C cup or higher, this won’t look right. Also, the bathing suit smelled horrible! I can’t even explain what it smelled like, but it was really bad. Sadly, this has to go back.
customer_reviews.author: M. Brown

customer_reviews.title: So Cute, Excellent Fit!
customer_reviews.text: I love this swimsuit! I have not owned a swimsuit in years, I’ve just been super self conscious, but this is so cute and I can’t wait to wear it this weekend! The fabric is exactly what I expected, just a regular swimsuit fabric. The fit is so great it’s snug in the right areas and flares at the perfect time so It accentuates my waist without highlighting my belly. The padding in the cups is easy to take out if you don’t like it, it’s a great length, too. It does tie around your neck, so keep that in mind if you have a heavy chest like me!
customer_reviews.author: EstherTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful suit, liked the way it fit
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful suit, liked the way it fit. I wear a DD and the padded cups would not even cover my breast. I actually removed them. I wish it had some form of molding/cups that fit, I would feel more confident in the way my breasts looked. Otherwise, I love it. Great buy for the price. I have not worn it to swim yet so I'm anxious to see if it floats up and would be annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Ryann

customer_reviews.title: Very flattering, love the vintage look
customer_reviews.text: Got tons of compliments on this one. It’s perfect for covering up enough but still flattering. I appreciate not also needing a coverup. I walk out the door in it to the pool. I felt like a vintage pin up girl. The pads in the top were lumpy but I replaced them with others. Crotch could use a panel in the shorts but again, for the price and overall extremely flattering style, this is minor. I’m 5’5 and 145 lbs, hour glass shape, average bust. I bought a large and it fit perfectly. Glad I didn’t get a medium. I bought two of these because I love them so much.
customer_reviews.author: Tifgmu2003

customer_reviews.title: Favorite swimsuit ever!
customer_reviews.text: Love this swimsuit ! Love that it’s a one piece with shorts and skirt. It’s good high quality material but it is MADE IN CHINA .. it ships from a USA company but made out of country just FYI . It runs big but I feel that’s ok I’m in between sizes so if I ordered another one I will try a size down. For reference I am between women’s 16-18 and bust size 42DDD . The busy fits perfectly it’s a little long but I think after all the pool time with 3 kids it may last longer than most suits since we live in the pool all summer long! Happy shopping all!
customer_reviews.author: Pinky27

customer_reviews.title: Very cute swimsuit
customer_reviews.text: I gained weight this year after a bad fall and months of "resting" with my arm up. I needed a new swimsuit for our badly needed family vacation (we found a cute little remote cabin with a hot tub for a change of scenery). I am 5'6" with measurements all over the place-- 45" hips, 36C" bust, 40" waist. Last weight check was 199lbs. I got the XXL (aka size 14) and it fit me perfectly. The color and shape are flattering. The material is nice and thick. I am very happy with my purchase (I got the all black with white stripes at the bust option).
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and flattering
customer_reviews.text: I searched and searched, reading reviews upon reviews, to find something comfortable and flattering. This is the one! I wear a 34 G bra, and stand 5'6 at about 190 pounds. It is flattering, covers the tops of my thighs nicely, and contains my chest! I did remove the white bra pads. And, as anyone with large breasts knows, halter tops can start to hurt your neck after a while. But the fabric was soft enough that if I placed the knot just right on the back of my neck, it didn't hurt as much. I love this swimsuit and don't feel embarrassed wearing it!
customer_reviews.author: MissMusicality

customer_reviews.title: Great swimsuit for bigger girls.Beautiful swimsuit and good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this swimsuit and one other from Amazon for our beach trip and I love both! I love this swimsuit because it looks exactly like the picture and fits pretty well it hides my tummy which I like after having two kids I can't wear a bikini anymore because of my stretch marks. It's very flattering and I'm not self conscious while wearing it. The only thing I don't like about it is the bottoms. It's just one piece all together and since I'm on the shorter side and don't have a long torso the bottom doesn't sit snugly in the downstairs area.
customer_reviews.author: #HPlover

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I’m pretty sure this is my favorite bathing suit I’ve ever owned, I get compliments every time I wear it and even my teenage daughter thinks it’s adorable. I’m 5’7” and 180 pounds after having 6 kids and this suit is still super flattering. I’ve worn it almost daily for over 2 months in our pool and hot tub and it still looks brand new. I came back to buy another one but can’t decide between all the cute patterns!
customer_reviews.author: Hutchmomma

customer_reviews.title: Happy tears post double mastectomy- I feel like a lady, again!
customer_reviews.text: As a curvy, fairly young ish lady post double mastectomy, I have had a rough time with finding clothes that fit right and make me feel feminine. I dreaded buying swimwear for this very reason. But, I took the plunge and bought this beautiful swimsuit. It arrived today, and when I put it on and looked in the mirror, I had happy tears! It was not only flattering, but I felt feminine in it. Breast cancer has taken so much from me, but this swimsuit has made me feel much better. My daughter even said, “ohh mom, you look so pretty!” When she saw it. Definitely a great choice!
customer_reviews.author: betsy crockett

customer_reviews.title: Cute. No tummy control. Shorts underneath huge. No support for large breasts.
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute. And, the quality is surprisingly nice. They would've been awesome if they had some tummy control ( they have zero tummy control ), and if those leg openings on the bottom shorts were not so weirdly huge. They also run a bit large. And if you have to take out those breast cups ( they are tiny ) because you have large girls ( DDD ), there is zero support for them. But, if you don't mind any of that, these are pretty nice. Just not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Luna

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to Love, but cup size too small
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a 42D bra, so based on reviews I got a 3X. The waist was huge and cups way too small. Even with the pads removed the cups were so small. It was very cute and I wanted to like it so badly, but I’d have to get it altered and it’s not worth it at this price. The material was thick and comfy, the halter top was cute, there is no underwire.
customer_reviews.author: kris

customer_reviews.title: best bathing suit I've ever worn
customer_reviews.text: WOW!! This bathing suit is perfection. I have never felt so comfortable and attractive in swimwear before. I'm 5'3", 130lb, and a 32D and the small fits perfectly. It's good quality, too. So glad I took the leap of buying online. Absolute steal!
customer_reviews.author: Madeline

customer_reviews.title: nice material, nice design, a bit small
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'4" and currently 142 lbs. I bought the Medium and it is a bit too small. I will exchange it for the Large. It is very narrow through the torso and waist. If you are narrow in those areas and my approximate size and like tight bathing suits, then it may be okay. I HATE stuff that's too tight and currently I'm thicker through the middle than I am normally, and I bought this as a "fat" suit, not as an incentive to lose. That said the fabric is smooth and stretchy, so i expect once I get the Large, it'll be very comfortable and flattering.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Rose

customer_reviews.title: True to size & flattering
customer_reviews.text: I usually have to buy swimwear 2 or 3 sizes larger, but I think I could have gotten my true clothing size. I bought it 1 size larger, but didn't need to. I'm a 38D/40C chest, bigger in the stomach, with smaller hips/thighs/booty. The bottom of the shorts are cut outward, which I feel would help people who have a bigger bottom area, but it was a bit loose for me. However, the rest of the suit fit perfectly, so I'm keeping it. I typically have more issues with the top part fitting and being supportive, but this suit is great.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea W.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this based on all the great reviews and pictures. It looked horrible on me. I'm short, so maybe that was it. I ordered my regular swimsuit size and it was tight in the middle section and loose on the bottom. I looked squatty and awful. If I would have ordered a size (or TWO) larger, that wouldn't have fit right either. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Calzon

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable, supportive and exactly the amount of coverage that I was hoping for. I was wary of buying the first swimsuit I've had in a long time onlin, but it ended up fitting perfectly! I personally sewed the straps down to the back because the halter neck was really uncomfortable for my neck because of my chest, but it took about 5 minutes to do.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Duffy

customer_reviews.title: !!Full figured rears-pay attention!!
customer_reviews.text: This bathing suit is super cute and very flattering for a full figured woman. I am 5’3” 230 DDchest and 40bra strap and it fit perfect up top and seemed to fit fine elsewhere until I got in the water and noticed the shorts portion was floating around my butt and thighs instead of being confirmed around my lower half so I guess maybe I ordered too big and should have got the 1x. If your very full figured below get the same size you normally do if your like me with more petite lower half and all boobs and tummy up top then size down
customer_reviews.author: StefInThe360

customer_reviews.title: Flattering
customer_reviews.text: I really like this suit. It is very flattering and made well. I reduced my star rating by 2, 1 for each annoying problem with this suit. #1, there is no elastic around the leg openings which causes the bottom of the suit to ‘float’ around causing unwanted exposure and wedgies. I have been wearing panties under it for swimming. #2, the foam cups in the top shift while swimming and end up at the top of the bra area, folded or bunched up. I had to remove them for swimming. The suit is very heavy as well but it is double lined for a non see through advantage. I love the colors too.
customer_reviews.author: Juls B

customer_reviews.title: Cute, flattering suit
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute suit, very flattering. Modest without being dowdy. I'm an odd size, I wear a 42DD bra, 1-2X top and 16/18 bottom. I bought the 4X to fit on top and it worked well. I would have given 5 stars if it had support in the bust. The halter ties bear all of the weight on the back of my neck. Still, it's not too uncomfortable, I spent all day at the beach without complaint.
customer_reviews.author: GypsyWriter

customer_reviews.title: Must Have 👙
customer_reviews.text: Totally in love with this bathing suit! I’m 5’ 2” with 34G chest and 140 lbs. It is really hard to find suits to fit my chest and the rest of my body. I have big boobs, a great ass, and a cute little jelly roll in the middle. I love that this suit flatters my beat assets while still leaving a little to the imagination. I’m obsessed and plan to get another one!
customer_reviews.author: Cristi V

customer_reviews.title: Order only one size up!
customer_reviews.text: This is a super cute retro suit. I'm 5'6 and US size 12. Based on the reviews I ordered the xxx. Bad idea- baggy in the waist and droopy butt :/ .I should've ordered the xx... Maybe even the XL to suck me in a bit lol. One downside to the suit is that even tho there are shorts under the skirt, it's all one piece... So to go potty you have to pull the whole thing down.
customer_reviews.author: shoptilidrop

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and fit.
customer_reviews.text: I have this in the regular red, white, and blue from Pin Up Girls clothing (I had to have it the second I saw the girls on Glee wear it during a number lol. I LOVE fifties styles clothing). Theirs is excellent quality, albeit expensive, but the skirt was a separate piece and sold out, then discontinued, so I bought this one in a different color. The quality is surprisingly near theirs. Overall, great swimsuit. It did bleed a bit when I washed it first, but I expected that and washed it separately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sweet and Sexy Swim Dress
customer_reviews.text: This is an Awesome little swim dress. It fits my style, which is in that sweet spot between over-covered and over-exposed. The adjustable top and removable pads allows you to find the right amount of Va-Va-Voom that fits your style. The boy leg built-in suit is the perfect length and fits well with the vintage style of the dress. Because of my muscular ‘man-legs’, I do have to make adjustments when choosing Top cleavage control vs Bottom fit comfort. Overall... This Dress Rocks! I’m 5’2”, 135 (still working off my QuaranTEN), and have already ordered another dress in another fabulous color.
customer_reviews.author: HOOPurr

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Not only was I pleased with the product, my husband nearly fell over when he saw me in the bathing suit so that was a definite plus. It fits great all over and I'm really happy with the fit and the look. I've never really been one to wear a one-piece and being a larger size girl I was really happy with the way my boobs look as well. You didn't actually have the original one that I wanted, it was out of stock. But I have to say this one just looks great on me and the black is very slimming.
customer_reviews.author: cassandra dohm

customer_reviews.title: Boyfriend approves and so do I!
customer_reviews.text: Boyfriend approves and so do I! Loving the cute retro look and flattering cuts (I have a lot of problem areas on my body). Admittedly, I'm using the cup pads that were included. This photo depicts how the swimsuit looked straight out of the package. My measurements at the time of taking this pic: chest 38; upper waist 33; lower belly into hips 40 inches; I'm 5' 4" and a size 10 dress. I ordered this swimsuit in size L and the fit was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Buneeb

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: This bathing suit is super flattering, go with your gut and get it! I am 6’0, 285lbs and have a large chest (42M to be exact) so the girls are always top of mind when I look to buy a suit. There is plenty of space, the suit is supportive enough, and it hides all of the areas that you are looking to hide while still being cute. The only negative is that the suit came to me stained, so I’ll return it for another one and hope for the best. I may just get the lemon suit as a back up too :)
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Ruan

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Bathingsuit
customer_reviews.text: This is probably my favorite bathing suit I own. I'm plus size and love how this fits. It holds my DD chest up without hurting the back of my neck, it creates the cutest hourglass shape, and the suit is incredibly comfortable. The only small issue are the shorts being much larger than the rest of the fit - I got nervous in the pool if any of the kids had goggles on they would see EVERYTHING up the leg hole. Even that isn't a deterrent not to buy. Love this suit!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: I wear a US size 12 and this is a little big on me but I'm keeping it because I don't want to get one that's too tight. The bra part has a lot of support, it's a little stiff but not too bad. I love the look, the polka dots, the tie around the neck that is adjustable. I love the skirt part so my butt isn't totally on display. I like that every little bump and lump isn't showing thanks to the design. I put on weight after a surgery and want to swim for exercise without feeling self-conscious. This suit is great. I definitely recommend this bathing suit. I will definitely buy another if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of compliments
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought this sailer style might be a little "cheesy" for me, but I found I liked it. It was figure flattering as much as can be for a large girl like me (I am a 3x). I am rather short-waisted so find the lining and shorts a bit long in the body for me, especially when wet and loose, but that part is under the skirting and really doesn't show so hasn't been a huge problem. Overall, I would purchase a suit from this company again. People who complimented me on it were amazed I had purchased it "online".
customer_reviews.author: Bon

customer_reviews.title: Suit is adorable, breast pad inserts are too small.
customer_reviews.text: This is an adorable suit. It fits great. My only issue were the breast pad inserts in the suit. They were too small and looked like little white circles. It also gave me the uniboob look like when you wear a sports bra. But, I didn’t want to send the suit back, so I bought some inserts that were larger and it worked perfectly! If you have larger breasts, you may want to consider the minimal support in the chest area. The extra cost of better inserts was totally worth it for me.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Beyond adorable - so flattering
customer_reviews.text: I have the body of someone who sits at a desk eating chocolate & brie cheese all day (I wonder why...) and yet, when I put on this totally adorable pin-up girl swimsuit, my husband glanced over and said, "Yeah. You need to buy TWO of those!!" That's how cute it is. Rarely do I write reviews - but this suit is the greatest. I did get two, by the way. Orange flowered & the lemon & polka dot one.
customer_reviews.author: Lorelei Ghanizadeh

customer_reviews.title: Flattering!
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews, I decided to order an XXL. I'm 5'3", 34 DD, and typically a size 14 bottoms, L or XL tops. It was a little loose near the booty, making me wish I would have ordered an XL. But the chest fit me perfectly - I would have been afraid to order a smaller size for fear my boobs would hang out. None the less, the suit is very comfortable. It covers the gut and chub on the thighs. Very flattering, esp for curvy girls like myself. I haven't worn a swim suit in four years and was mortified to put one on for my honeymoon coming up. This suit as totally eliminated my fear.
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: How can a swimsuit make me look GOOD?!
customer_reviews.text: It's just so flattering! I got a large since I'm 5'2", 145lbs. So I'm a little short & a little thick. BUT THIS JUST LOOKS SOOOO GOOD! The only part that's a little loose is the shorts, but not by much, & it's covered by the skirt. It flatters my curves in the best ways, and hides my tummy (which is my least favorite part on me). I never thought a swimsuit could ever make me feel confident, but this one just slays. I immediately had to put it on and take photos cause I just felt so great.
customer_reviews.author: Kavi Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for any age
customer_reviews.text: I normally go up a size in my bathing suits because I’m tall and I don’t like them tight around my legs because I’m self conscious about my body. Definitely stick to your true size!! I’m almost 50 but have 3 teenage daughters and my oldest, 21, ordered one for herself. (Of course that made me feel great!) With the retro vibe in style it definitely gives you the “pin up” type of woman. I felt great in this suit and I wear a size 12-14. The neckline gave it a wow factor without being over the top. Any aged woman could wear this suit. It also looked adorable on my petite daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S

customer_reviews.title: I returned this suit.
customer_reviews.text: I initially was hesitant about this swimsuit but after reading all of the positive reviews, I decided to give it a try. In my opinion, and on my body, this is highly unflattering and the cups in the bust made the girls look awkward and misshapen. I ordered an xl, as I wear a size 12, but it was too large in the back, waist, and buttocks area. I probably would have just settled for it to save the extra cash on a more expensive suit, but as I said, the bust region seemed poorly made and flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: ndjen1

customer_reviews.title: Cute suit
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this suit and a 16, it fits perfect. I love the boy legs under the skirt and the tie around the neck is very comfortable. I will leave the bra cups in although they could be a little bigger they still give me shape and support. I go to water aerobics 3 to 4 times a week, this was very comfortable my first time wearing that I am going to order a couple more and I got compliments on it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute but cut weird
customer_reviews.text: The halter top on this suit is SO cute and if the bottom had been cut well, it would have been perfect but the torso is abnormally long, leading to the flare occurring lower, on the hips instead of closer to the bust line, for a less flattering fit and the skirt was a little shorter than I anticipated (Though the undershorts are cute) which would not have been solved if I bought a smaller size. I ordered using their sizing chart (not Amazon's) but it was way too big, by 1.5-2 sizes. It unfortunately had to go back.
customer_reviews.author: Rainstorm9

customer_reviews.title: Busty ladies, this is for us!
customer_reviews.text: YES!!! I'm 5' 5", 155lb, 36DD, hour glass shaped. I ordered a large, because as busty ladies know all too well, the girls gotta fit. It arrived today and it fits PERFECTLY in the chest! My only complaint, and this was honestly to be expected, is that while the top fits wonderfully, the bottom boy-short portion is kind of loose. This is my usual dilemma, XL tops and M bottoms are my go-to, BUT the skirt portion covers this area so I'm not too worried about about it, as I'd rather feel like my chest is supported over a covered area fitting perfectly. I'm probably buying another soon!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany A

customer_reviews.title: Gives my banana body an hourglass shape!
customer_reviews.text: This is really comfortable. I haven’t worn it in water yet, so I don’t know how it’ll hold up, but other reviews say it’s great. My only minor issue is that the shorts ride up my butt. Still... I love it so much that I turned around and bought the navy blue (skirt) with the red/white stripes (chest).
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Yes it works as a maternity suit!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it looked cute and the price was right. At 32 weeks pregnant I decided to try it on and was pleasantly surprised that it fit and felt roomy in the belly. It's not meant to be a maternity suit so the dress part rides up but it seems to work well and provide good coverage. I was a size 12 pre-pregnancy, am a size Large in most maternity clothes and ordered the XXL. Currently wearing a 34GG bra and this suit provides good boob coverage and the halter that ties behind the neck provides decent support. Haven't worn it in the water yet!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Who

customer_reviews.title: Great swimsuit
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this swimsuit in Medium and it fit perfectly. I'm normally a size 8 dress and pant size. Also, I'm very top heavy (38D) so I was worried it was not going to fit but it was very comfortable. I've been looking for swimsuit with lemons for the summer and this print was so cute. Also, I like how it's like a one piece with the shorts attached. You can wear it in a hotel and not feel self conscious going to the pool. I would definitely recommend this swimsuit!
customer_reviews.author: jewelsjyx

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for big bust, but definitely size down if you have a normal torso
customer_reviews.text: Love this suit! I bought an 18 the usual size I wear. Top fit great. I have full breasts and it held them in nicely. I am 5'9" and the skirt is a little short. It doesn't cover the shorts. The shorts are a little loose. I should have gotten a size 16. I have a long torso and I always find one pieces too short in the torso. I love the way it looks. I will keep the suit I have even though it is loose. I'm afraid going down a size will make the skirt even shorter. Still looks amazing even though my torso makes the skirt short.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Top is see through when wet :(
customer_reviews.text: So so so cute. I love it but..... As soon as the top gets wet it's completely see through :/ trying to think of ways to fix it but yea it needs a nude lining. :/ so bumbed.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Mette

customer_reviews.title: So flattering, many compliments
customer_reviews.text: This suit was extremely flattering. The horizontal stripe to accentuate the bust and vertical stripe to lengthen the torso visually really flattered the figure. The halter style neck strap concealed the trouble area right underneath the arms and was super comfortable. The ties are long but can make a real cute bow. All in all, many compliments and comfy. There is more weight to it than a regular tankini so it takes longer to dry. I will probably buy another one, I was that happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very flattering!
customer_reviews.text: I felt very cute wearing this swimsuit which, as a bigger girl, is a rare treat! When double-knotted the ties behind the neck were sturdy enough to withstand a day at the water park, and the little skirt was enough that I didn't feel like I needed to run for a towel to cover up with every time I was out of the water. The only issue I found was that the butt area seemed a little large for how well the rest of the suit fit (especially considering that I'm more pear-shaped, so usually I have the opposite problem) but it didn't cause any issues. Definitely would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great swimsuit!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I normally hate swimsuits and swimsuit shopping. There have been years where I'm still searching for a decent suit in July. Not this year! It's only March and check me out!!! This suit manages to hide a lot of my unflattering areas. It's easy to move around in and I'm confident it will stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Adia88310

customer_reviews.title: Great swimsuit, cute, modest, and flattering :3
customer_reviews.text: I’m 38b, 36, 42 measurements. 5’1, 170 pounds. Ordered the xl and it fits perfect! Cute little dress swimsuit, looks very flattering and thins you out, helps keep waist definition, makes you look amazing <3 I’m on the smaller chested side, have 0 problems. There’s very slight and light padding on the cup part, it’s not a push-up though or anything like that and you don’t need “chest” to fill it out or anything. Very cute swimsuit, glad I bought :3
customer_reviews.author: taylor

customer_reviews.title: you need to buy this suit!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the fit of this suit! I am a size 18 pants and am built pear shaped I purchased the xxxl(16) due to a lot of the reviews saying it was loose in the tummy area and legs. having a smaller bust (38B) it is difficult to find a suit that flatters, but this one does it! the red/white stripe is more of a cream/red (but the neck straps are bright white) the material of the suit is high quality... I was actually impressed at how heavy it was, but when wearing is super comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: The Parts

customer_reviews.title: Senior Suit
customer_reviews.text: I have always been skinny, until I hit 60's, so I was very body shy when going out to the pool. Now I have "curves" (more like rolls) that need a kinder cut in swimsuits. Plus, I have a long body, and usually bought tankinis for a better fit. Well, this one-piece fits so well that I ordered another one. I am very happy with the fit. Not too tight in the thighs. Nice coverage under the arms and behind the back. Covers nicely without looking like a floating dress. (Sorry, no pics. Too shy.)
customer_reviews.author: DVpam

product_meta.title: COCOSHIP Vintage Sailor Pin Up Swimsuit Retro One Piece Skirtini Cover Up Swimdress(FBA)
feature_bullets: Sizes(recommend):Small:US6 Medium:US8 Large:US10 X-Large:US12 XX-Large:US14 XXX-Large:US16 4XL:US18 5XL:US20 6XL:US22
Pattern:Vintage Sailor Pin Up One Piece Skirtini Cover Up Swimdress
